      <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 10pt; line-height: 115%">
       <span style="font-size: 11pt; mso-ansi-language: en-us; mso-fareast-language: en-us">
        <font face="Calibri">
         <font size="4">
          The
          <strong>
           PROPRIETARY
           <em>
            (DIO-TECH-GRAFT)
           </em>
           TECHNOLOGY
          </strong>
          is
          <strong>
           REGISTERED
          </strong>
          with  
		the
          <strong>
           U.S. PATENT
          </strong>
          and
          <strong>
           TRADEMARK OFFICE
          </strong>
          .
          <strong>
           (VOTED The #1 Informational Hair Transplant Website)
          </strong>
          that gives Patients the Most Complete,  
		Honest and Factual Data by The Medical Information Association, USA. Our new proprietary Pore Dilation Technology is finally here!
          <o:p>
          </o:p>
         </font>
        </font>
       </span>
      </p>
      <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 10pt; line-height: 115%">
       <span style="font-size: 11pt; mso-ansi-language: en-us; mso-fareast-language: en-us">
        <font face="Calibri">
         <font size="4">
          Our Technology in Hair Transplantation has become The Future Hair Replacement Wonder of the World.
         </font>
        </font>
       </span>
       <span style="font-size: 11pt; mso-ansi-language: en-us; mso-fareast-language: en-us">
        <font face="Calibri">
         <font size="4">
          The
         </font>
        </font>
       </span>
       <span style="font-size: 11pt; mso-ansi-language: en-us; mso-fareast-language: en-us">
        <font face="Calibri">
         <font size="4">
          <strong>
           <em>
            (Dio-Tech-Graft) Registered
           </em>
          </strong>
          is  
		one of the Most Natural Premier ways to get your (Real) hair back to the thickest it can be Permanently!
          <o:p>
          </o:p>
         </font>
        </font>
       </span>
      </p>
      <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 10pt; line-height: 115%">
       <span style="font-size: 11pt; mso-ansi-language: en-us; mso-fareast-language: en-us">
        <font face="Calibri">
         <font size="4">
          We use our Proprietary Pore  
		Dilation Solution to open up your old hair follicle pores where your original hairs used to grow out of. These pores then can stay  
		open for approximately three to four hours or until our
          <strong>
           <em>
            Certified Medical Team
           </em>
          </strong>
          inserts your new hair graft follicles into them. Each  
		dilation injection can dilate as many as thirty to fifty pores at one time by using the smallest and tiniest needle manufactured,  
		causing the least amount of pain.
          <o:p>
          </o:p>
         </font>
        </font>
       </span>
      </p>
      <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 10pt; line-height: 115%">
       <span style="font-size: 11pt; mso-ansi-language: en-us; mso-fareast-language: en-us">
        <font face="Calibri">
         <font size="4">
          <strong>
           <em>
            This True and Wonderful State-OfThe-Art Technique
           </em>
          </strong>
          does away with all of our competitors Neo/Punch-Plug  
		Graft methods of punching holes in your scalp, which causes skin dips, large craters, creating massive amounts of scar tissue and  
		loss of blood flow to your current cherished hair and scalp.
          <o:p>
          </o:p>
         </font>
        </font>
       </span>
      </p>
      <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 10pt; line-height: 115%">
       <span style="font-size: 11pt; mso-ansi-language: en-us; mso-fareast-language: en-us">
        <font face="Calibri">
         <font size="4">
          Our competition have gone so far as to pretend to be a new patient coming  
		into our office and then having us complete their own personal hair transplant procedure on their own head, so as to try to acquire  
		(Our Technology)!
          <o:p>
          </o:p>
         </font>
        </font>
       </span>
      </p>
      <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 10pt; line-height: 115%">
       <span style="font-size: 11pt; mso-ansi-language: en-us; mso-fareast-language: en-us">
        <font size="4">
         <font face="Calibri">
          We have been doing this
          <strong>
           <em>
            <font color="#ff0000">
             (TRULY MINIMALLY INVASIVE)
            </font>
           </em>
          </strong>
          hair transplantation technology with
          <strong>
           <font color="#ff0000">
            (97%-100% SUCCESS)
           </font>
          </strong>
          of your  
		Natural
          <em>
           <strong>
            Dio-Tech-Grafts
           </strong>
           
          </em>
          growing Permanently and Forever! Our Proprietary Technology has been proven to produce Faster and more Efficient  
		surgeries with Minimal discomfort and Quicker healing times; as has been reported by our Many Satisfied Patients!
          <o:p>
          </o:p>
         </font>
        </font>
       </span>
      </p>
      <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 10pt; line-height: 115%">
       <span style="font-size: 11pt; mso-ansi-language: en-us; mso-fareast-language: en-us">
        <font size="4">
         <font face="Calibri">
          Give us a call now  
		or email us right away! So together we can get you started on the path of becoming the New and Looking Younger Person, that You Deserve  
		to Be, With the Utmost Confidence".
          <strong>

  <div class="cc01" id="e65">
   <div>
    <div align="center">
     <font color="#ff0000" size="6">
      <strong>
      </strong>
     </font>
    </div>
    <div align="center">
     <font color="#ff0000" size="6">
      <strong>
       If you have had a Hair Transplant Surgery of any sort,
      </strong>
     </font>
    </div>
    <div align="center">
     <font color="#ff0000">
      <strong>
       <font size="6">
        you need to read our Important
       </font>
       <a href="http://www.hairtransplanthairrestoration.com/density_sessions.html">
        <font size="6">
         Density Sessions Page
        </font>
       </a>
       <font size="6">
        !
       </font>
      </strong>
     </font>
    </div>
   </div>
